History Class Reference

History of the simulation The history class maintains a circular buffer to store past simulation states. It provides thread safe accessor to the buffer. More...

Detailed Description

History of the simulation The history class maintains a circular buffer to store past simulation states. It provides thread safe accessor to the buffer.

Definition at line 18 of file history.cc.

boost::shared_ptr< WorldInformation > History::get_oldest_unused ( bool  block = false  ) 

gets the oldest WorldInformation object in the buffer as copy and marks it as consumed. If no consumeable WorldInformation is available either the thread is blocked (blocked = true) or a NULL pointer is returned (block = false).

Definition at line 30 of file history.cc.

const WorldInformation & History::get_newest (  )  const

returns a const reference to the newest world information object in the buffer. Should never be called if there is another thread which might call push_back() concurrently

Definition at line 47 of file history.cc.
